structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
SHERIFFS, CONSTABLES, AND COUNTY POLICE FORCE

law.catch_line: Fines, forfeitures and fees -- Sheriff to collect.
law.text: The sheriff shall collect and account for all fines and forfeitures, and all officers' fees listed with him, and payable in his county, during his term of office.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4572.
